english.segment1: The sun rises every day. The moon comes to chase away. Stars and beauty decorate. Its all You
english.segment2: The rain comes to make the day. Sunshine washes her away. There is wonder in the air. Its all You
english.segment3: All good things come from You. Yeah the stars they burn for You. Every blessing, every truth. Every answer God its You. Yeah
english.segment4: Still Your light it shines for us. You illuminate our hearts. Glory radiates in us. Its all You
english.segment5: Still forever You're unchanged. Oh Your glow will never fade. You're the light unto our world. Its only You
english.segment6: All good things come from You. Yeah the stars they burn for You. Every blessing, every truth. Every answer God its You
english.segment7: Kingdoms come and kingdoms fall. You will rise above it all. Kingdoms come and kingdoms fall. You will rise above it all
english.segment8: All good things come from You. The stars they burn for You. Every blessing, every truth. Every answer God its You
english.segment9: All good things come from You. Let our hearts burn for You. Every moment, every day. May our lives shine for You. Only You
